MetaData.MetaDataItem: For wireless switching of: light bulbs, HV and LV halogen lamps or electrical equipment (e.g. fans). Combinable with all Z-Wave transmitters and remote controls, with installation in splash-proof junction box IP 44, can be selectively installed in flush-mounted power points and canopies or triggered directly via wireless rockers.

ChangeLog.Entry: Initial Metadata Import from Z-Wave Alliance Database - https://products.z-wavealliance.org/products/338/xml
